sentences: Speaking in Cleveland, Ohio, Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton called for unity in the wake of the tragic shooting in Orlando.

sentences: Here are key moments from that speech.

sentences: (Reuters/Associated Press)Hillary Clinton delivered an address pledging that as president she would take on "lone wolves" who might carry out terrorist attacks in the United States and calling for unity in light of the massacre at a gay nightclub in Orlando on Sunday.
label: true_
